sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含有"打赌，赌博"之意。
means: bet ： 指竞赛中的打赌，也指双方对有疑惑之事争执不下的打赌。在口语中，bet作"确信，敢说"解。
gamble ： 多指投机，为获得某物或牟利而冒大险，含孤注一掷意味。

sentence.Network_en: Jockeys are forbidden to bet on the outcome of races.
sentence.Network_cn: 职业赛马骑师禁止对赛马结果下注。

sentence.Network_en: Do you always have a bet on the Grand National?
sentence.Network_cn: 你总是对全国赛马大会下点注吗？

sentence.Network_en: Large overseas-based trusts are an excellent each way bet.
sentence.Network_cn: 大型海外基金的投资前景非常好。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)the outcome of a situation is unpredictable
(N. Amer. informal)risk everything that one owns on a bet, investment, or enterprise
jx.jx_cn_mean: (北美，非正式)（在赌博、投资或风险事业上）孤注一掷；破釜沉舟

lj.lj_ly: this isn't a great time to bet the farm on the Internet.
lj.lj_ls: 现在不是在因特网上孤注一掷的有利时机。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to express doubt about an assertion or situation

lj.lj_ly: he may be a suitable companion—but don't bet on it.
lj.lj_ls: 他可能会是个合适的同伴——但这也难说。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to express vigorous disagreement with a confident assertion
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)敢打赌吗？（用于表示强烈不同意某种说法）

lj.lj_ly: ‘You can't be with me every moment.’ ‘Want to bet?’.
lj.lj_ls: “你不可能时刻都和我在一起。"“打不打赌？"。

lj.lj_ly: ‘Would you like this piece of pie?’ ‘You bet!’.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: perhaps a shortening of the obsolete noun abet 'abetment'

encyclopedia.content: bet，英文单词，测试法的一种，该方法由于是依据著名的BET理论为基础而得名。BET是三位科学家（Brunauer、Emmett和Teller）的首字母缩写，三位科学家从经典统计理论推导出的多分子层吸附公式基础上，即著名的BET方程，成为了颗粒表面吸附科学的理论基础，并被广泛应用于颗粒表面吸附性能研究及相关检测仪器的数据处理中。

entry.def: If you bet on the result of a horse race, football game, or other event, you give someone a sum of money which they give you back with extra money if the result is what you predicted, or which they keep if it is not.

example.ex: Jockeys are forbidden to bet on the outcome of races...
example.tran: 职业赛马骑师禁止对赛马结果下注。

example.ex: I bet £10 on a horse called Premonition...
example.tran: 我在一匹名叫“预兆”的赛马上下了10英镑的赌注。

entry.def: A bet is a sum of money which you give to someone when you bet.

example.ex: You can put a bet on almost anything these days.
example.tran: 如今几乎可以对任何东西下赌注。

entry.def: If someone is betting that something will happen, they are hoping or expecting that it will happen.

example.ex: The party is betting that the presidential race will turn into a battle for younger voters...
example.tran: 该党期待这次总统竞选变成一场争取年轻一代选民的斗争。

example.ex: People were betting on a further easing of credit conditions.
example.tran: 人们期待着贷款条件进一步放宽。

entry.def: You use expressions such as 'I bet', 'I'll bet', and 'you can bet' to indicate that you are sure something is true.

example.ex: I bet you were good at games when you were at school...
example.tran: 我敢说你上学时体育很棒。

example.ex: I bet you anything you like he's a pimp...
example.tran: 我敢打包票，他是个皮条客。

entry.tran: 十拿九稳的事；有望成功的行动；合适之选
entry.def: If you tell someone that something is a good bet, you are suggesting that it is the thing or course of action that they should choose.

example.ex: Textiles are a good bet for a country bent on industrialisation...
example.tran: 纺织业对于致力于工业化的国家来说是个比较稳妥的产业。

example.ex: Your best bet is to choose a guest house.
example.tran: 你最好选择一个小旅馆。

entry.tran: 极有可能属实（或发生）的事
entry.def: If you say that it is a good bet or a safe bet that something is true or will happen, you are saying that it is extremely likely to be true or to happen.

example.ex: It is a safe bet that the current owners will not sell.
example.tran: 十有八九现在的业主不会出售。

entry.def: If you hedge your bets, you follow two courses of action to avoid making a decision between two things because you cannot decide which one is right.

example.ex: NASA is hedging its bets and adopting both strategies.
example.tran: 美国航空航天局做了两手准备，两套策略双管齐下。

entry.tran: （通常感到恼火或好笑时表示同意或认为属实）那是，说的是，一点没错
entry.def: You use I bet or I'll bet in reply to a statement to show that you agree with it or that you expected it to be true, usually when you are annoyed or amused by it.

example.ex: 'I'd like to ask you something,' I said. — 'I bet you would,' she grinned.
example.tran: “我想问你点事，”我说。——“我就知道你要问，”她笑道。

entry.def: You can use my bet is or it's my bet to give your personal opinion about something, when you are fairly sure that you are right.

example.ex: My bet is that next year will be different...
It's my bet that he's the guy behind this killing.
example.tran: 我认为他就是这起凶杀案的幕后主使。

entry.tran: 不要认为；别指望；不一定
entry.def: If you say don't bet on something or I wouldn't bet on something, you mean that you do not think that something is true or will happen.

example.ex: 'We'll never get a table in there' — 'Don't bet on it.'
example.tran: “我们在那儿是订不上座了。”——“那可不一定。”

entry.tran: （表示确信对方说的不对）敢打赌吗？
entry.def: If you reply 'Do you want to bet?' or 'Want a bet?' to someone, you mean you are certain that what they have said is wrong.
You use 'You bet' or 'you bet your life' to say yes in an emphatic way or to emphasize a reply or statement.

example.ex: 'Are you afraid of snakes?' — 'You bet your life I'm afraid of snakes.'
example.tran: “你怕蛇吗？”——“这还用问，我当然怕啦。”

means.word_mean: 1. the money risked on a gamble
1. maintain with or as if with a bet;
2. stake on the outcome of an issue;

sentences.sentence: "She played all her money on the dark horse"
"you can count on me to help you any time"
"Depend on your family in times of crisis"

example.en: A: Can I? B: You betcha!
example.zh: 甲:我行吗? 乙:肯定行!

example.en: You can bet London to a brick that it'll rain tomorrow.
example.zh: 你可以确信明天会下雨。

auth_sentence.content: For fans this album is an entirely safe bet.
auth_sentence.res_content: For fans this album is an entirely safe bet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For fans this album is an entirely safe bet.

auth_sentence.content: Bet you a tenner they're famous by autumn.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bet you a tenner they're famous by autumn.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bet you a tenner they're famous by autumn.

auth_sentence.content: I bet you it wasn't a climate scientist.
auth_sentence.res_content: I bet you it wasn't a climate scientist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I bet you it wasn't a climate scientist.

Sentence.sentence: I bet you get a lot of requests for it.
I bet you get a lot of requests for it.
When planes fall from the sky, as a Yemeni airliner did on its way to Comoros Islands in the India ocean June 30, 2009, the black box is the best bet for identifying what went wrong.
Offering a job to a man is the safer bet.
Offering a job to a man is the safer bet.

sentences.en: His bet on the boat race was 50.
sentences.cn: 他下在赛船上的赌注是50美元。

sentences.en: Some people are fond of betting.
I bet you twenty cents on his winning.
I bet you can't do this puzzle.
sentences.cn: 我敢说, 你解决不了这个难题。

sentences.en: Which horse did you bet on?

means.word_mean: 敢断定，敢说，断言，有把握说，敢于肯定(将发生的事)；预言

sentences.en: I bet that it will snow tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我敢说明天一定会下雪。

means.word_mean: 与(某人)打赌，与(某人)用(钱、物等)打赌

sentences.en: I bet her ￡200 that she would lose the vote.
sentences.cn: 我拿200英镑和她打赌，说她在选举中肯定落选。

jushi.chinese: 我愿以一个月的工资打赌。
